column1: #text=Yesterday I went to the library to borrow a book .
#text=I was interested in learning more about birdwatching so I thought the library would be a great resource .
#text=I asked the librarian where the books on nature and birds were .
#text=She told me the call numbers of the aisle and I went to that aisle .
#text=Each book had a small sticker on the spine indicating the call number .
#text=The books are organized by subject , so reading the call numbers is helpful for finding things .
#text=I browsed through the books on birds .
#text=I picked one up and flipped through it .
#text=It had a lot of beautiful photos and interesting facts and tips for watching birds .
#text=I decided this would be a great book to start with .
#text=I brought my book to the circulation desk and waited in line .
#text=When it was my turn , I handed the librarian my library card .
#text=She scanned the book , opened up the flap , and stamped the due date on the inner card .
#text=I 'd be able to borrow the book for three weeks .
#text=When the due date came , I would return it to the front desk or the book drop box .
